actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to proposals currently before the Congress negatively affecting the forestry industry.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the House should reject any tax reform proposal which contains specified provisions affecting the forest products industry.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to proposals currently before the Congress negatively affecting the forestry industry.
